div.head: 夾陰傷寒
div.div: sexuality related harm caused by cold

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: sexuality related harm caused by cold

sense.def: Pathological Condition of a type of shang han 傷寒 , harm caused by cold, where a person first followed his lust and then was affected by cold evil, with the result of yang weakness and an abundance of yin. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry ren shen 人參 quotes SHYY : 夾陰傷寒， 先因欲事，後感寒邪，陽衰陰盛，六脈沉伏，小腹絞痛，四肢逆冷，嘔 吐清水，不假此藥，無以回陽 , “ Sexuality related harm caused by cold : A person first followed his lust and then was affected by cold evil, with the result of yang weakness and yin abundance. The movements in the six vessels are deep inside and subdued. The lower abdomen has a twisting pain. The four limbs have counterflow with cold. [Patients] vomit clear water. If one does not take recourse to this drug, there is no other way to have the yang return”.
